text: Hagi Solomoni'ene Israeli vahe'mo'za ne'zana kre'za nene'za musena Ra Anumzana tagri Anumzamofo avuga hu'naze. Hagi noti kaziga Lebo-hamatiti evuno sauti kaziga Isipi tinte'ma evigeno, tusi vahekrerfamo'za atru hu'za 7ni'a knafi kre sramnavu itamofona musena hunte'za ne'zana kre'za nene'za, 7ni'a knafina ko'ma fugagi noma ki'za mani'za e'naza zankura ne'zana kre'za nene'za antahimi'naze. Hagi ana makara 14ni'a knafi ne'zana kre'za nene'za musenkase hu'naze.
